author: emanueltilly
post_text: July 30, 2014 at 1:58 PM#1Hi!I usually have a exec for a certain fixture group with one cue for every col preset I have. At the moment I do I all manual, but is there a way to create a macro that stores preset 1.4.1 thru 1.4.20 for a specific group of lights to cues?Tried some things but they really never worked out that great.
title: Store range of presets to cuelist?
